text: Rheosaurus sulcarostrum is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. (Echinosaura sulcarostrum, new species). The species is endemic to Guyana. It is monotypic in the genus Rheosaurus. ==Habitat== R. sulcarostrum is found in leaf litter on the floor of high-canopy rainforest. ==Geographic range== R. sulcarostrum has been found in northwestern Guyana at low elevation. Because of its secretive habitat, it is likely to be found elsewhere. ==References== ==External links== *. title: Rheosaurus
